lines.text: I had the courage to love twice in my life. And here you are. At my final hour, gathered at my sight. I am truly touched.
Why do you turn your back on everything? On the people who care about you?

Thaddeus, who do you think I am? What did you think we were? Did you think you were my savior? The rich, charitable man who reached out and saved the poor lonely child? No, man, you were a john. You were a sucker. Don't look to me for caring because I don't care. I'll take anyone, I'll take Eva, I'll take you, I'll take anyone, it doesn't matter, because I am a hustler. Whether it's sex, or this bullshit that I sell, anything, do you know why? Because I don't give a fuck. That's how I stay alive. You were just another rich, white, gay sucker, ready for me to take, and that's what we had.
Don't get involved, it's a waste of time! I just wanna push my bullshit, eat, sleep, fuck and finally die. That's all!
